## Packages in STATA

###[hysi package](https://github.com/kkushnarev/HySI). The package adjusts confidence intervals in LASSO used for selection to account for the selection event.

#### Installation

To install the hysi package in Stata, run:

```stata
. net install hysi, replace from("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kkushnarev/hysi/main/")
```
